Create a 3 tier, multi-project structure (root; mayberry and raliegh; xxxDAT, xxxEJB, etc.)
Create pom projects in upper two tiers (root; mayberry and raliegh)
Move project 1 projects (xxxDAT) below appropriate mid-level pom projects (mayberry and raliegh)
Create a set of EJBs to host the business logic and data access tiers
Create a set of EARs to host the EJBs and their depenencies
Create a set of Test projects to test the EJBs using their remote interfaces
Once you have the remote interfaces of the EJBs tested, move onto connecting the two projects and building Web Tier
Don't forget to add transaction declarations before complete
